CustomField.formula: if(or(RecordTypeId == LEFT($Setup.IDStep__c.Id_RecordType_Complete_Registration__c,15), RecordTypeId == LEFT($Setup.IDStep__c.Id_RecordType_Compliance_Initial_Validat__c,15), RecordTypeId == LEFT($Setup.IDStep__c.Id_RecordType_Compliance_Step_1__c,15), RecordTypeId == LEFT($Setup.IDStep__c.Id_RecordType_Compliance_Step_2__c,15), RecordTypeId == LEFT($Setup.IDStep__c.Id_RecordType_Docs_Validation_VV__c,15), RecordTypeId == LEFT($Setup.IDStep__c.Id_RecordType_Engineering__c,15), RecordTypeId == LEFT($Setup.IDStep__c.Id_RecordType_Finance_Step_1__c,15), RecordTypeId == LEFT($Setup.IDStep__c.Id_RecordType_Finance_Step_2__c,15), RecordTypeId == LEFT($Setup.IDStep__c.Id_RecordType_HSEQ_EPCI_or_Operation__c,15), RecordTypeId == LEFT($Setup.IDStep__c.Id_RecordType_Procurement_Manager__c,15), RecordTypeId == LEFT($Setup.IDStep__c.Id_RecordType_Quality__c,15), RecordTypeId == LEFT($Setup.IDStep__c.Id_RecordType_Vetting_Final_Check__c,15)), true, false)
CustomField.label: Step approval flow
